Lyrics: wel van passe, niet te groet.
Poetic Translation: And she was the perfect size.

Lyrics: Ic quam gheloepen met eenem spronck.
Direct Translation: See Mick Swithinbank's work at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: In fervor toward her myself I flung

Lyrics: Ic custe se an haren roede mont.
Poetic Translation: And kissed her on her mouth of rosy red.

Lyrics: Scoen lief, ghy compt zo selden.
Ey ridder, seyt so edel ghenoet,
Poetic Translation: My champion, princely hero, my prize;

Lyrics: hu liefde quelt my totter doet.
Poetic Translation: This yearning love is my demise."
